description:
Ordered to obtain intel on the Empire`s hero, Lavi`s group of four find themselves in the Port City of Ordis. They`re there to infiltrate a party, but Lavi has other ideas, much to Talion`s chagrin.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: An Invitation to the Port City Engulfed in Darkness
Invitation dans la ville portuaire voilée de ténèbres
Yami ni Oowareta Konpeki e no Shoutai
闇に覆われた紺碧への招待
